label: Bullard, Stephen A.  2014. Blood flukes (Digenea: Aporocotylidae) of elopomorphs: emendation of Paracardicoloides, supplemental observations of Paracardicoloides yamagutii, and a new genus and species from Ladyfish, Elops saurus, (Elopiformes: Elopidae) in the Gulf of Mexico. Journal of Parasitology 100(3): 305-316.
value: Bullard, Stephen A.  2014. title: Blood flukes (Digenea: Aporocotylidae) of elopomorphs: emendation of Paracardicoloides, supplemental observations of Paracardicoloides yamagutii, and a new genus and species from Ladyfish, Elops saurus, (Elopiformes: Elopidae) in the Gulf of Mexico.
